goals.description: Implement nutrient BMPs to reduce TN, TP, and sediment in the watershed.
goals.sourceExcerpt: Nutrient BMPs will be implemented watershed...target both TN, TP and sediment reduction as soils in MS are known to have high phosphorus content.

goals.description: Achieve 50% fecal coliform reduction in Hickahala Creek and 70% in James Wolf Creek.
goals.targetArea: Hickahala Creek and James Wolf Creek sections
goals.sourceExcerpt: The Fecal Coliform TMDL for Hickahala Creek is calling for a 50% reduction...The same TMDL also calls for a 70% reduction in James Wolf Creek.

goals.description: Install conservation BMPs such as fencing, watering facilities, heavy use areas, ponds, streambank and shoreline protection, and grade stabilization structures.
goals.sourceExcerpt: Installation of the following BMPs would mitigate sediment and nutrient issues...: fencing, watering facilities, heavy use areas, ponds, streambank and shoreline protection, and grade stabilization structures.

goals.description: Leverage and maximize education and outreach activities to promote best management practices and water quality improvement.
goals.sourceExcerpt: To maximize education and outreach activities and monitoring efforts, MDEQ plans to leverage with existing programs already allocated for funding where possible.

goals.description: Monitor baseline and post-implementation water quality to track changes resulting from BMPs.
goals.sourceExcerpt: Facilitate... the completion and implementation of an effective and efficient plan to monitor baseline water quality conditions in the watershed and track changes in water quality over time resulting from the BMPs implemented through this project.

goals.description: Establish the Watershed Implementation Team (WIT) to refine and implement the watershed-based plan.
goals.sourceExcerpt: Establish Watershed Implementation Team to begin refinement of Watershed Based Plan for Basket Creek-Hickahala Creek watershed

goals.description: Achieve water quality standards for dissolved oxygen, nutrients, E. coli, and other key parameters.
goals.sourceExcerpt: The following thresholds will be used to measure compliance with water quality criteria: ... Dissolved Oxygen, Total Nitrogen, Total Phosphorus, E. coli, etc.

bmps.name: Grade Stabilization Structures
bmps.description: Structures designed to control grade and reduce erosion in channels and waterways

bmps.name: Conservation Tillage
bmps.description: Tillage practices that maintain crop residue coverage

bmps.name: Nutrient Management
bmps.description: Managing amount, source, placement, form and timing of plant nutrients

implementation.description: Install grade stabilization structures at priority locations

monitoring.parameter: Total Suspended Solids, Total Nitrogen, Total Phosphorus
monitoring.method: Monthly grab samples and continuous monitoring
monitoring.frequency: Monthly during growing season, quarterly during winter
monitoring.sourceExcerpt: The following thresholds will be used to measure compliance with water quality criteria: ... Dissolved Oxygen, Total Nitrogen, Total Phosphorus, E. coli, etc.

outreach.description: Educational workshops on conservation practices and water quality
outreach.indicator: Number of participants, practice adoption rates
